API Collection# FixedWidthInteger Implementations

## [Topics](/documentation/Swift/Int8/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#topics)

### [Operators](/documentation/Swift/Int8/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Operators)

[`static func &* (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&*(_:_:))Returns the product of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &*= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/int8/&*=(_:_:))Multiplies two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &+ (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&+(_:_:))Returns the sum of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &+= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/int8/&+=(_:_:))Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &- (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&-(_:_:))Returns the difference of the two given values, wrapping the result in case of any overflow.[`static func &-= (inout Self, Self)`](/documentation/swift/int8/&-=(_:_:))Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable, wrapping any overflow.[`static func &>> (Int8, Int8) -> Int8`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-1v821)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>> <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-24uqw)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<< <Other>(Self, Other) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-2a90q)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<< (Int8, Int8) -> Int8`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-4szuk)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<< (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-7028d)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &>> (Self, Self) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__(_:_:)-9x51j)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width.[`static func &<<= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__=(_:_:)-6g9h1)Returns the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the left, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width, and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.[`static func &>>= <Other>(inout Self, Other)`](/documentation/swift/int8/&__=(_:_:)-9dar0)Calculates the result of shifting a value’s binary representation the specified number of digits to the right, masking the shift amount to the type’s bit width, and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.### [Initializers](/documentation/Swift/Int8/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Initializers)

[`init<T>(T)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(_:)-7lqol)[`init?(String)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(_:)-89uu)Creates a new integer value from the given string.[`init?<S>(S, radix: Int)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(_:radix:))Creates a new integer value from the given string and radix.[`init(bigEndian: Self)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(bigendian:))Creates an integer from its big-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.[`init?<T>(exactly: T)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(exactly:)-16mcu)[`init(littleEndian: Self)`](/documentation/swift/int8/init(littleendian:))Creates an integer from its little-endian representation, changing the byte order if necessary.### [Instance Properties](/documentation/Swift/Int8/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Instance-Properties)

[`var bigEndian: Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/bigendian)The big-endian representation of this integer.[`var littleEndian: Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/littleendian)The little-endian representation of this integer.### [Type Methods](/documentation/Swift/Int8/FixedWidthInteger-Implementations#Type-Methods)

[`static func random(in: Range<Self>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/random(in:)-2fyvz)Returns a random value within the specified range.[`static func random(in: ClosedRange<Self>) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/random(in:)-5kgo1)Returns a random value within the specified range.[`static func random<T>(in: Range<Self>, using: inout T) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/random(in:using:)-1n6up)Returns a random value within the specified range, using the given generator as a source for randomness.[`static func random<T>(in: ClosedRange<Self>, using: inout T) -> Self`](/documentation/swift/int8/random(in:using:)-8ennz)Returns a random value within the specified range, using the given generator as a source for randomness.
